title: Am i the only one who doesnt like the new Katarina?
body:
Old kat was much better imo.. wasnt easy to play, as a lot presumed, she was a bit tricky
funny as hell on someone who didnt know how to play her...
but deadly and so good on the eye when played by an expert!
she was fast.. now she is so slow, i can barely watch her now T_T

replies.body: Old kat was so easy to play first time playing her in aram at lvl 6 penta kill. than in norms quads up my bung hole so easy to play ._. her rework requires some strats now and I love that sh*t
You are likely one of the few. This introduced way more counterplay to her, and that's good for both skilled Kat players and opponents. It means she can be stronger in the hands of an expert.
How is "wait until the team fight has spent all CC, use ultimate and gain penta" hard exactly?
Old Katarina was so ridicuously easy and binary to play that it was impossible to balance her- thus she was stuck being shit.
Only thing I'm glad to see gone is her damage reduction from Shunpo. She never needed that.

Wrong. Shes squishy as hell? Also her damage now is hard as hell to even hit, so now you jump in and barely do any damage. Then die because you have no damage reduction, and you cant ward jump out if you needed to.

She never needed that. She's an Assassin, they are supposed to be squishy. She wants to dive in, she doesn't need this power to stay there and be unstoppable no other assassin could do anything like that.  They should be risky champs that have a way in but don't need a way out or to be unkillable with 3 hp.
Shes been like this for one day. You can not already have an opinion on her lol.

> [{quoted}](name=ItsOrval,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R2hgArKt,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-11-10T21:16:19.605+0000)
>
> Shes been like this for one day. You can not already have an opinion on her lol.

You can play 5 games of her and see the difference, regardless of how long she's been released. She's definitely more clunky, she doesn't feel as smooth to play. Her W as a MS boost feels very awkward and doesn't fit Kat well.
If you mained katarina, like I always have, you can easily see the ins and outs of any rework. Yes even in one day. As a seasoned Kat player too, I think her new kit is absolutely terrible.
No you're not the only one.
